author: Staff Reporter
text:
NCC cadet Sgt. Danny Angel Giftlin of Holy Cross Anglo Indian Higher Secondary School, Thoothukudi, was felicitated for having attended the TAL-SAINIK camp-2015 in October at New Delhi.

According to a statement here on Monday, she was felicitated by Headmistress Sr. Nirmala and NCC Officer Lolita Jude.

Speaking on the occasion Sgt. Danny said that she owed her success to her parents, school, NCC unit and the staff.

Further, she said NCC gave her confidence, and made her work with determination, sincerity and courage.
title: NCC cadet felicitated
